column2: SELECT i_gal,ra_gal,dec_gal,R5#kpc_arcmin FROM MYDB.VYGs_RR  OPEN my_cursor   WHILE(#=#)  BEGIN    FETCH NEXT from my_cursor into @i_gal, @ra_gal, @dec_gal, @R5#kpc_arcmin    IF (@@fetch_status < #) break    INSERT MYDB.VYG_neighbours    SELECT @i_gal, p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, (p.petromag_g - p.extinction_g) as magPetro_g,     (p.petromag_r - p.extinction_r) as magPetro_r, (p.petromag_i - p.extinction_i) as magPetro_i,     n.distance    FROM dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(@ra_gal,@dec_gal,(@R5#kpc_arcmin)) as n, Galaxy as p    WHERE    n.objID = p.objID AND    p.type = # AND    (p.petromag_r - p.extinction_r) < # AND    (p.petromag_r - p.extinction_r) > #    END         CLOSE my_cursor  DEALLOCATE my_cursor
